author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Chinese economy shrinks as Wuhan death toll rises 50%
description: Chinese authorities revise the death toll in Wuhan up by 50 per cent to 3,869
content:
Chinas economy shrank 6.8 per cent in the three months of 2020, the countrys first such contraction on record and a stark sign of the financial impact of the coronavirus pandemic.
The news came as Chinese authorities revised the death toll in Wuhan, the hard… [+4107 chars]
